title: Favourite Lemon Drizzle Cake
ingredients: ['400g butter (plus a bit extra to grease the tin)', '400g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '8 eggs', '400g flour', '5 teaspoons baking powder', 'zest and juice of 1 lemon', 'Lemon glaze', 'Juice of 2 lemons', '1 tablespoon icing sugar']
